subject: Basketball
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: As the United States basketball team climbed from bronze medal disappointment in 2004 to heavy favorite at these Olympics, LeBron James and Mike Krzyzewski went from relative strangers to trusted confidants.
snippet: As the United States basketball team climbed from bronze medal disappointment in 2004 to heavy favorite at these Olympics, LeBron James and Mike Krzyzewski went from relative strangers to trusted confidants.
